ml_tags: In loving memory of Lilas Lilas was a very curious and informed little girl After some very interesting stories with her older sister she developed a fear of bones She loves her best friend, Hannah the ostrich and enjoys the company of her cousin, Sophie when she first meets someone, she'll be very quiet and mysterious. Lilas loves her family and   .. even though she's very different everybody got along for the most part. Lilas was such an amazing character and really makes one's life all better without even trying 2016 - 2024 Lilas
